name: Puzzle Glow-All in One
description:
PUZZLE GLOW comprised of shapes, lines, colors, numbers and symbols.
It’s easy to learn and fun to master. You can grow your problem-solving skills!
Enjoy thought-provoking fun with the addictive puzzle games.
You can not stop playing such games that will increase your brain!
Are you ready? Free download and play the all in one classic puzzle games now!
FEATURES
• Simple but innovative puzzles!
• Suit for all ages!
• Clean and simple graphics !
• Support mobile phones & tablets as an universal app.
• No WI-FI, Offline game! Enjoy the game everywhere!
• No time limit! Play with enough time!
• Top rated games! Many people like the PUZZLE GLOW!
PUZZLE GLOW includes puzzle games as below:
NUMBER LINK
• Draw the glow line to connect same color bulbs.
• Connect all dots on the board. In other words, fill the all cells.
• Challenge 900 stages!
FILL LINE
• Draw the line by given figures (shapes).
• Fill up the entire board by just one line.
• Challenge 900 stages!
HEXA BLOCK
• Drag hexagonal blocks & place them on the board.
• Fill the all cells.
• Challenge 900 stages!
SLIDING PUZZLE
• Move the blocks and connect the wires between the bulbs.
• When all wires are connected, bulbs light up.
• Challenge 900 stages!
SQUARE BLOCK
• It’s another fun game with hexa block.
• Drag square blocks & place them on the board.
• Fill the all cells.
• Challenge 900 stages!
ONE TOUCH PUZZLE
• Draw the line by given figures (shapes).
• Connect all dots by just one touch (line/stroke).
• Challenge 450 stages!
MORE PUZZLES
• In addition to the puzzle games listed above, there are more games available.
• We will add new puzzle games continuously.
NOTE
• PUZZLE GLOW contains the ads include banner, interstitial and video ads.
• PUZZLE GLOW sells in-app products like hints, gems or AD-FREE.
• PUZZLE GLOW requires some permissions to optimize the game and integrate some services.
- Network access and view connections, Receive data from internet, Storage, Photos/Media/Files, Prevent sleeping, Vibration control, Etc.
Let's PUZZLE GLOW!
